name: AWARE - Web Atlas for Agriculture, Environment and Research
description: AWARE is a web cartographic platform for cataloging, sharing, and publishing geographic data in agriculture, environment, and tropical agronomy research. It enables easy access to catalogs of resources (layers, maps, documents) and supports accurate searches with filters such as categories, keywords, and regions. AWARE also allows for map creation and data archiving. It is developed by the ARTISTS team at CIRAD for use by researchers, professionals, and institutions, and is based on open source and interoperable technologies.
owner_name: CIRAD (Centre de Coopération Internationale en Recherche Agronomique pour le Développement)
